quotes.quote: A clear conscience is a good pillow.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: A conscience is what hurts when all your other parts feel so good.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A guilty conscience needs no accuser.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A good conscience is a continual Christmas.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If all the world hated you and believed you wicked, while your own conscience approved of you and absolved you from guilt, you would not be without friends.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: A lot of people mistake a short memory for a clear conscience.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: In the courtroom of the conscience, a case is always in progress.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: Conscience is God's presence in man.
quotes.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

quotes.quote:
There is one thing alone
that stands the brunt of life throughout its course:
a quiet conscience.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Conscience is what makes a boy tell his mother before his sister does.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Fear is the tax that conscience pays to guilt.
quotes.author: George Sewell

quotes.quote: Labor to keep alive in your breast that little spark of celestial fire called conscience.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Conscience is a mother-in-law whose visit never ends.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Conscience is the inner voice that warns us somebody may be looking.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Before I can live with other folks, I�ve got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn�t abide by majority rule is a person�s conscience.
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: The conscience of a people is their power.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: All a man can betray is his conscience.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Conscience is the perfect interpreter of life.
quotes.author: Karl Barth

quotes.quote: I cannot and will not cut my conscience to fit this year's fashions.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: Most people sell their souls, and live with a good conscience on the proceeds.
quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quotes.quote: Freedom is a clear conscience.
quotes.author: Periander

quotes.quote: Conscience is the voice of the soul.
quotes.author: Polish Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no witness so dreadful, no accuser so terrible as the conscience that dwells in the heart of every man.
quotes.author: Polybius

quotes.quote: Courage without conscience is a wild beast.
quotes.author: Robert Ingersoll

quotes.quote: Conscience and reputation are two things. Conscience is due to yourself, reputation to your neighbour.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: It behoves every man who values liberty of conscience for himself, to resist invasions of it in the case of others; or their case may, by change of circumstances, become his own.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: ...the safest course is to do nothing against one's conscience. With this secret, we can enjoy life and have no fear from death.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Cowardice asks: Is it safe? Expediency asks: Is it politic? But Conscience asks: Is it right?
quotes.author: William Punshon
